channel.title: Pot help

item.title: Pot help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

You may have to edit it to the specific type of server you have, but this is what mine is.

[code=java]
case 2434:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of your restore prayer potion.");
			c.sM("You have 3 doses of potion left.");

c.deleteItem(2434, slot, 1);
c.addItem(139, 1);
c.prayerRestore();
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[5] + “”, 4012);
break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Pot help
item.dc:creator: @chromeblade0 chromeblade0
item.description:
@chromeblade0 wrote:

help! when i atempt to drink my potion it wont work and nothing happens it says prayer usage item id 2434 and thats for a pray potion were wouldi add this and what would it be this is what i have so far

case 2434
deleteItem(2434, slot, 1);
addItem(2435, 1);
